channel.title: Got a shop probelm (richscape)
channel.description:
ok so i add a shop called it shop 12 (easy~)
added the shop 1d and npc id to the client.java got it right
Richscape is now online _______________________
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "1 2 " at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at Shop.loadShops(Shop.java:115) at Shop.<init>(Shop.java:30) at Server.main(Server.java:30)
i don't know what ive done ?
